stories.text:
RunPod.io has partnered with /u/entmike to create a free and open platform for exploring generative art: https://discord.gg/ZDdjFzwWQq

We started a website to enable easier viewing of galleries (pardon the dust, it's very WIP): https://www.feverdreams.app/

The community made us an awesome study tool: https://observablehq.com/@jgrunik/fever-dreams

Fever Dreams is very much in active development, so please excuse us when the queue gets jammed or if things don't work. Issues usually get fixed very fast :)

Compute is sponsored by RunPod.io and you can easily create private art there as well: https://runpod.io/blog/disco-diffusion-on-runpod?ref=hnews
